ygData.subject: rtNEAT License?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ken, Would it be possible to release rtNEAT under the GPL, LGPL, or similar open source license? I d like to eventually release my work under one of these open

Ken,

Would it be possible to release rtNEAT under the GPL, LGPL, or similar
open source license? I'd like to eventually release my work under one
of these open source licenses, but I don't think the current UT
Research License would permit that.

Regards,
Chris
